Class BitOutput

java.lang.Object
  jinahya.io.BitOutput

public class BitOutput
extends Object

Class for bit level output.

Author:
Jin Kwon

writeUSASCIIBytes

public final void writeUSASCIIBytes(byte[] value)
                             throws IOException
